channel.title: [562] Clients Not Working
channel.description:
Hey. I recently just downloaded GazaaScape, and I'm trying to make a webclient. Whenever I use any client to connect, it just won't work. I've edited the IP to my current IP, 127.0.0.1, and 192.168.1.1 and 192.168.1.100. None of those work with any other clients I download. But when I use the GazaaScape client, it works great. The only problem is that JARMaker won't make a webclient with the GazaaScape client for some reason. The .jar file won't open. I can make webclients with the other clients that I download though. If I use any other client, I also get this error message.
log4j:WARN No appenders could be found for logger (org.apache.mina.filter.executor.ExecutorFilter). log4j:WARN Please initialize the log4j system properly.
It only happens when the other client tries to connect. If I run the server and do nothing, then the error message doesn't appear. But when I run the client, it gives me that error message. In the client cmd, I also get the error_game_js5connect message, but I know that it's because it can't connect. So no problem with that. Just not sure if that will help anything. Edit: I've also port forwarded.

item.title: [562] Clients Not Working
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“ThaNamesRyan, post:1, topic:398586”]Hey. I recently just downloaded GazaaScape, and I’m trying to make a webclient. Whenever I use any client to connect, it just won’t work. I’ve edited the IP to my current IP, 127.0.0.1, and 192.168.1.1 and 192.168.1.100. None of those work with any other clients I download. But when I use the GazaaScape client, it works great. The only problem is that JARMaker won’t make a webclient with the GazaaScape client for some reason. The .jar file won’t open. I can make webclients with the other clients that I download though.

If I use any other client, I also get this error message.

[quote]log4j:WARN No appenders could be found for logger (org.apache.mina.filter.executor.ExecutorFilter).
log4j:WARN Please initialize the log4j system properly.[/quote]

It only happens when the other client tries to connect. If I run the server and do nothing, then the error message doesn’t appear. But when I run the client, it gives me that error message.

In the client cmd, I also get the error_game_js5connect message, but I know that it’s because it can’t connect. So no problem with that. Just not sure if that will help anything.

Edit: I’ve also port forwarded.[/quote]

Go to http://www.canyouseeme.org/
Type in your server port in the box
Click “Check”
If at the bottom it says “I cannot see you” then the port isn’t forwarded.

Read full topic
